entry.title: Reading List 2014-March-17
entry.content:
General

  4. Josh Timonen — My Brain Has No Space For Your User Interface

  3. Tracking Exceptions With Spring – Part 2 – Delegate Pattern

  5. Error handling in Storm Trident topologies
  6. Identifying Gradle Conventions
  7. Postgres and Oracle compatibility with Hibernate
  8. Event processing in camel-drools
  9. Using Lucene’s search server to search Jira issues
  10. Playing with ANTLR4, Primefaces extensions for Code Mirror and web-based DSLs
  11. How to fire Mac OS X notifications with AppleScript (Scala or Java, too)
  12. Creating Complex Test Configurations with Red Deer
  13. Integration testing custom validation constraints in Jersey 2

Cloud & DevOps

  2. Bringing Razor into Puppet Enterprise

Scala

  1. Scala – Building ‘control structures’ with types and call-by-name parameters

Frontend development

  1. Event-driven application design with JavaScript
  2. Why I was Wrong to be Afraid of Angular.js (pt2) 14 March 2014
  3. You Don’t Know JS: Scope and Closures

In Russian

  1. ФОТОЖУРНАЛ ХЭ : АНАЛИТИКА : АНТОН ВЕРШОВСКИЙ : ОТКРЫТИЕ ПЛОСКОСТИ
